location.zh-cn: 广东省江门市新会区崖门镇

description.zh-cn: 南宋末年宋军与元军进行的一场大规模海战，标志着南宋的灭亡和元朝对中国的统一。
description.en: A large-scale naval battle between the armies of the Southern Song and Yuan dynasties in the late Southern Song dynasty, marking the end of the Southern Song and the unification of China by the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国（后为元朝）对南宋的征服战争，历时四十余年，最终以元朝胜利告终。
description.en: The conquest of the Southern Song dynasty by the Mongol Empire (later the Yuan dynasty), which lasted for more than forty years and ended in a Yuan victory.

description.zh-cn: 由蒙古族建立的中国朝代，在崖门海战后统一了中国。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty established by the Mongols, which unified China after the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 中国宋朝的后半段，在崖门海战中被元朝所灭。
description.en: The latter half of the Song dynasty in China, which was destroyed by the Yuan dynasty in the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 元朝将领，崖门海战中元军的主帅，指挥元军取得了决定性胜利。
description.en: A general of the Yuan dynasty, commander-in-chief of the Yuan forces in the Battle of Yamen, who led the Yuan army to a decisive victory.

description.zh-cn: 元朝将领，西夏皇族后裔，在崖门海战中率军增援张弘范。
description.en: A general of the Yuan dynasty and a descendant of the Western Xia imperial family, who reinforced Zhang Hongfan's army during the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 南宋末年将领，与陆秀夫、文天祥并称“宋末三杰”，在崖门海战中担任宋军总指挥，战败后突围，不久后溺死。
description.en: A general in the late Southern Song dynasty, known as one of the 'Three Heroes of the Late Song' along with Lu Xiufu and Wen Tianxiang. He served as the commander-in-chief of the Song forces at the Battle of Yamen, broke through the siege after the defeat, and drowned shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 南宋末年左丞相，在崖门海战兵败后，为免被俘受辱，背负年幼的宋少帝赵昺投海殉国。
description.en: The Left Chancellor of the late Southern Song dynasty. After the defeat at the Battle of Yamen, to avoid capture and humiliation, he committed suicide by jumping into the sea with the young emperor Zhao Bing on his back.

description.zh-cn: 南宋最后一位皇帝，宋度宗之子。崖门海战战败后，由陆秀夫背负跳海身亡，年仅8岁。
description.en: The last emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, son of Emperor Duzong of Song. After the defeat at the Battle of Yamen, he died at the age of 8 when Lu Xiufu jumped into the sea with him.

description.zh-cn: 南宋倒数第二位皇帝，宋度宗之子，赵昺之兄。在元军追击下南逃，最终病逝。
description.en: The second to last emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, son of Emperor Duzong of Song and elder brother of Zhao Bing. He fled south under the pursuit of the Yuan army and eventually died of illness.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第六位皇帝，宋端宗赵昰和宋少帝赵昺的父亲。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, father of Emperor Duanzong (Zhao Shi) and Emperor Shao (Zhao Bing).

description.zh-cn: 宋度宗的妃子，宋端宗赵昰和宋少帝赵昺的生母。在听闻赵昺死讯后自杀。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Duzong of Song and the biological mother of Emperor Duanzong (Zhao Shi) and Emperor Shao (Zhao Bing). She committed suicide after hearing the news of Zhao Bing's death.

description.zh-cn: 南宋末年泉州提举市舶的阿拉伯裔商人，拒绝帮助南宋行朝，后投降元朝。
description.en: An Arab merchant who served as the Superintendent of Maritime Trade in Quanzhou during the late Southern Song dynasty. He refused to help the fleeing Song court and later surrendered to the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南宋末年丞相、文学家，在崖门海战前已被元军俘虏，并在元军船上目睹了宋军的覆灭。
description.en: A chancellor and writer of the late Southern Song dynasty. He had been captured by the Yuan forces before the Battle of Yamen and witnessed the destruction of the Song fleet from a Yuan ship.

description.zh-cn: 元朝将领张弘范的部将，在五坡岭生擒了文天祥。
description.en: A subordinate general under Zhang Hongfan of the Yuan dynasty, who captured Wen Tianxiang at Wupoling.

description.zh-cn: 宋元战争中的关键战役，元军攻克襄阳和樊城后，得以长驱直入，为灭亡南宋奠定了基础。
description.en: A crucial battle in the Song-Yuan Wars. After the Yuan army captured Xiangyang and Fancheng, they were able to advance deep into Southern Song territory, laying the foundation for its eventual demise.

description.zh-cn: 南宋将领，在崖门海战中投降元军。
description.en: A Southern Song general who surrendered to the Yuan forces during the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 南宋团练使，在崖门海战中投降元军。
description.en: A Southern Song militia commander (Tuanlianshi) who surrendered to the Yuan forces during the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 南宋都统，在崖门海战期间夜袭元军失败后阵亡。
description.en: A Southern Song commander (Dutong) who was killed after a failed night raid on the Yuan forces during the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 崖门海战的发生地。
description.en: The location of the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 崖门海战是宋元战争的最后一场战役，标志着战争的结束。
description.en: The Battle of Yamen was the final battle of the Song-Yuan Wars, marking the end of the conflict.

description.zh-cn: 元朝（及其前身蒙古帝国）与南宋进行了长达四十余年的战争，最终元朝灭亡了南宋。
description.en: The Yuan dynasty (and its predecessor, the Mongol Empire) fought against the Southern Song dynasty for over forty years, eventually conquering it.

description.zh-cn: 崖门海战的失败导致南宋全军覆没，标志着南宋的最终灭亡。
description.en: The defeat in the Battle of Yamen led to the annihilation of the Southern Song army, marking the final demise of the dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 崖门海战的胜利使元朝彻底消灭了南宋的抵抗力量，完成了对中国的统一。
description.en: The victory in the Battle of Yamen allowed the Yuan dynasty to completely eliminate the Southern Song's resistance forces and complete the unification of China.

description.zh-cn: 张弘范在崖门海战中担任元军指挥官。
description.en: Zhang Hongfan served as the commander of the Yuan forces during the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 李恒在崖门海战中率领元军加入战事。
description.en: Li Heng led Yuan troops to join the battle during the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 张世杰在崖门海战中担任南宋军队的指挥官。
description.en: Zhang Shijie served as the commander of the Southern Song forces during the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 在崖门海战战败后，为免被俘受辱，陆秀夫背负年仅8岁的赵昺跳海自杀。
description.en: After the defeat at the Battle of Yamen, to avoid capture and humiliation, Lu Xiufu committed suicide by jumping into the sea with the 8-year-old emperor Zhao Bing on his back.

description.zh-cn: 陆秀夫担任赵昺的太傅（老师）。
description.en: Lu Xiufu served as Zhao Bing's Grand Tutor (teacher).

description.zh-cn: 蒲寿庚拒绝借船给张世杰率领的南宋行朝，导致行朝只能离开泉州。
description.en: Pu Shougeng refused to lend ships to the fleeing Southern Song court led by Zhang Shijie, forcing them to leave Quanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 在拒绝南宋行朝后，蒲寿庚投降元朝。
description.en: After refusing the Southern Song court, Pu Shougeng surrendered to the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 襄樊之战的胜利为元军南下灭宋扫清了障碍。
description.en: The victory in the Battle of Xiangyang cleared the way for the Yuan army to advance south and conquer the Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在五坡岭生擒文天祥。
description.en: Captured Wen Tianxiang at Wupoling.

description.zh-cn: 在听闻宋帝昺在崖门海战后身亡的死讯后，杨太后赴海自杀。
description.en: After hearing the news of Emperor Zhao Bing's death following the Battle of Yamen, Empress Dowager Yang committed suicide by jumping into the sea.

description.zh-cn: 在崖门海战中投降元军。
description.en: Surrendered to the Yuan forces during the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 在崖门海战中投降元军。
description.en: Surrendered to the Yuan forces during the Battle of Yamen.

description.zh-cn: 在崖门海战期间夜袭元军失败后阵亡。
description.en: Was killed after a failed night raid on the Yuan army during the Battle of Yamen.
